spells.name: Adjustable Polymorph
spells.description: As alter self, but you can change the shape as a swift action.

spells.name: Contingent Scroll
spells.description: Transfer a scroll's power to the target; the scroll is then triggered as contingency.

spells.name: Feast on Fear
spells.description: Targets are panicked, and you gain temporary hit points.

spells.name: Path of Glory, Greater
spells.description: Create an expanding glow that heals allies within it of 5 hp of damage.

spells.name: Wall of Blindness/Deafness
spells.description: Translucent wall blinds or deafens creatures that pass through it.
